ValidationRule.description: Prevent user to Save case as Draft once it is in any other status
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: CH_RecordTypeCheck__c && NOT(ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE( Status ) , 'Draft')) && ISCHANGED( Status ) && TEXT( Status ) = 'Draft'
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are not allowed to save case in status Draft after it has been saved in another status.
